alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Kofa; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 20 at 7:02PM MST until August 20 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Parker Valley, Kofa and Central La Paz County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central La Paz; Kofa; Parker Valley
